attributes.action: Stop Blyk Changing The Plan To £15 A Month!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Are Loosing Out! The Free Texts And Calls Are Better We Get More.. £15 Gives Us Less And WOuld Probably Be Gone In 5 Days! STOP BLYK DOING THISS!!! They Are Trying To Rip us Off, As Lessening The Plan Forces Us To Top Up!!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
